titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to change certain requirements relating to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase certain income-related requirements with respect to a sponsor's affidavit of support for an alien.
